data.text: Righteous people sometimes die when they are still young,
and now they have peace.
Yahweh says, “But you who practice sorcery, come here!
Do you realize [RHQ] whom you are ridiculing,
You are eager to have sex under every big green tree where you worship your gods.
You take big smooth stones from the riverbeds
You have sex [EUP] with cult prostitutes on every hill and mountain,
You have put ◄fetishes/pagan symbols► behind your doors and doorposts,
You have given fragrant oil and lots of perfume to your god Molech,
You became weary because of doing all those things,
Was it because you were afraid of those idols more than you were afraid of me that you lied about what you were doing,
You think that [IRO] the things that you have done are right,
When you cry out for help to your collection of idols,
Yahweh will say, “Prepare yourselves to receive me,
Because this is what I, Yahweh, who am holy and greatly honored and who live forever, say:
I will not accuse people forever;
I was angry with my people because they sinned by wanting the things that others had.
I have seen the evil things that they continually do,
I will enable them to sing songs to praise me.
Wicked people do not have peace in their inner beings;
and I, Yahweh, say that things will never ◄go well/be peaceful► for those who are evil.”
